title: Motley Fool Money: 05.24.2013
description: The Fed stays the course.  Microsoft unveils the Xbox One.  And Disney makes some surprising cuts.    Our analysts discuss those stories.  Plus, corporate governance expert and film critic Nell Minow talks Apple, Buffett, and Memorial Day movies.
content:encoded: The Fed stays the course.  Microsoft unveils the Xbox One.  And Disney makes some surprising cuts.    Our analysts discuss those stories.  Plus, corporate governance expert and film critic Nell Minow talks Apple, Buffett, and Memorial Day movies.
